policies.involuntary_refund:
Involuntary Refund:
- If change is ≥3 hours and passenger declines → full refund allowed
- Cancel all segments in the PNR first
- Use ENDO BOX format: INV REF NO [Flight#/Date-CXL]
- No waiver code required
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Involuntary Reissue (Schedule Change):
- If passenger accepts new flight → reissue with ENDO BOX: INVOL SKCHG
- If passenger rejects → rebook closest available flight in same RBD
- If same class unavailable → contact neosair@apg-ga.us
- No waiver required
Voluntary changes follow fare rules. Penalties and fare differences may apply based on fare basis
policies.voluntary_refund:
- Follow fare rules associated with the ticket
- Refunds subject to cancellation penalties and service fees
- If ticket is non-refundable, taxes are also non-refundable
policies.medical_refund:
Please be advised that Neos HQ requires all cases to be opened directly via their website by either the agent or the passenger.

Register on the Neos website
Upload all relevant information and documents
The Customer Care Department will review the case and respond exclusively via the Neos website

https://identity.ticketing-neosair.it/Identity/Account/Register?returnUrl=%2Fconnect%2Fauthorize%2Fcallback%3Fclient_id%3Dneos.customercare%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fcustomercare.neosair.it%252FAccount%252FExternalLogin
policies.name_change:
If same RBD is available and correction ≤ 3 letters:
- Agency refunds ticket with wrong name
- Agency issues new ticket with correct name (same RBD, route, carrier)
- Agency must contact neosair@apg-ga.us to request a waiver code for the refund of the wrong ticket
- Waiver must be entered in ENDO BOX

If same RBD not available or correction >3 letters:
- Send request to usa@apg-ga.us
- Neos HQ performs name correction and agency loses booking control
- Must attach passport, include Neos PNR, wrong name and correct name
policies.group_booking:
Neos Group Booking Guidelines
A group = 10 or more passengers traveling together
To request a group, please email neosair@apg-ga.us with:

Route
Dates
Flight number or time
Number of passengers (adults & children)
ARC
Any specific requests

Important: All Neos group tickets will be issued by Neos HQ, not via GDS.

Refer to airline website:
https://www.neosair.it/en/before_the_flight/special_assistance/infant?lang=it

The "Unaccompanied Minor (UMNR)" service is required for any passengers aged 4–13 (up to their 14th birthday).
https://www.neosair.com/us/en/information/unaccompanied-minors
policies.baggage_policy:
Neos baggage allowance depends on the selected fare.
Please refer to:
- The applicable information in your GDS, or
- The Neos website to check cost for additional checked baggage
policies.seat_request_policy:
Special meals, wheelchair requests, and seat assignments can only be made via the Neos website after the ticket has been issued.
- Advance seat selection may be available based on fare
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
If GDS void fails within 24 hours:
- Send email to neosair@apg-ga.us with screenshot proof of when the void was requested and the error message
